threat: A remote attacker could possibly use this flaw to conduct request smuggling attacks.
A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause the Tomcat server to stop responding, resulting in a denial of service.
A remote attacker could possibly use this flaw to conduct session fixation attacks.
A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause the Tomcat server to stop responding, resulting in a denial of service.
